sections.title: Welcome to the “Connecting the Dots” Challenge
Rethink Reading. Rediscover Knowledge
sections.summary: What if every time you opened a PDF, it didn’t just sit there—it spoke to you, connected ideas, and narrated meaning across your entire library? That’s the future we’re building — and we want you to help shape it.
